Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to a license to sell liquor at retail for consumption on certain premises
Summary: Allows the state liquor authority to issue a retail license for on-premises consumption for a premises which shall be located within two hundred feet of a building occupied as a school, church, synagogue or other place of worship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to a license to sell liquor at retail for consumption on certain premises
